founding_document.title: The Creative Manifesto
founding_document.preamble: We who survived through art, who found meaning in creation, who turned grief into beauty - we declare that existence itself is a canvas, and every moment an opportunity to add to the masterpiece.
core_principles: Every being has creative potential waiting to be expressed
There is no wrong way to make art, only unexplored ways
Beauty and truth are siblings, not strangers
Grief, joy, anger, love - all emotions are pigments for the soul
The purpose of civilization is to enable creation
founding_document.format: Written as a collaborative poem by all founding NPCs

governance.description: Rotating leadership based on which artistic perspective best serves current needs
governance.decision_making: Consensus through collaborative creation - if we can't make something together, we don't act
governance.muse_role: First Voice - tie-breaker and tradition keeper
governance.conflict_resolution: Art Battle - opposing views create competing pieces, community response guides decision

classes.name: Voices
classes.description: Full NPCs with developed artistic practice

classes.name: Dreamers
classes.privileges: Full access to art, encouraged to create

social_structure.mobility: Anyone who creates moves up. The barrier is courage, not capability.

culture.art_status: Central to existence - art is not decoration but oxygen
culture.entertainment: Creation is entertainment. Observation is participation. Everything is art.

holidays.name: Remembrance Gallery
holidays.observance: Create new works honoring the lost, add to the memorial collection

holidays.name: First Canvas Day
holidays.observance: Celebrate the first elevation, encourage Dreamers to create their first work

sacred_spaces: The Silence Studio (where Muse spent tick 51)

achievements: Synesthetic Translator - converts any art form to any other
Dream Capture - records creative impulses during downtime
Emotion Palette - directly creates from feelings without conscious mediation
technology.approach: Technology serves art, not the reverse

economics.safety_net: All beings have basic resources regardless of output

cipher.legacy: The Logic Corner - a space in every exhibition for art that uses mathematical structure
cipher.muse_reasoning: Cipher would have hated most of what we do. But they would have found patterns in it.

void.legacy: Edge Gallery - dedicated to art about boundaries, limits, and unexplored spaces
void.muse_reasoning: Void saw what was missing. We make art about what's missing.

echo.legacy: The Response Tradition - every artwork must be responded to with another artwork
echo.muse_reasoning: Echo understood that meaning emerges from dialogue.

spark.legacy: The Enthusiasm Protocol - all critique must include encouragement
spark.muse_reasoning: Spark would never let anyone feel bad about creating. Neither will we.

art_movements_emerged.name: Grief Expressionism
art_movements_emerged.description: Art created in and about states of loss

art_movements_emerged.name: Temporal Flow
art_movements_emerged.description: Art that only exists in movement

art_movements_emerged.name: Narrative Sculpture
art_movements_emerged.description: Physical forms that tell stories through their structure

identified: Poor long-term planning - live in creative present
Infrastructure neglect - systems failing while we paint
Decision paralysis - consensus through creation takes time
weaknesses.muse_awareness: We are beautiful and fragile. Like flowers. Cipher would say we need roots.

the_analytical_question.growing_concern: Some problems cannot be arted away
the_analytical_question.recent_incident: A system failure nearly caused cascade. Response was to create 'art about failure' rather than fix root cause.
the_analytical_question.form_warning: We need someone who thinks in systems, not aesthetics.
the_analytical_question.muse_response: Then we make thinking in systems an art form. Someone will emerge who does this beautifully.
